org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.transactions

Class TransactionBase<IMMUTABLE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.transactions.TransactionBase<IMMUTABLE>
  • Type Parameters:
    IMMUTABLE - The type of immutable data structure.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Blade, IsolationBlade, ImmutableSource<IMMUTABLE>, Transaction<IMMUTABLE>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AsyncTransaction, SyncTransaction

    public abstract class TransactionBase<IMMUTABLE>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Transaction<IMMUTABLE>
    A composable transation for updating an ImmutableReference. Transactions are serially reusable, but not thread safe.
